1.2.04.name: wordpress/smaly-widget
1.2.04.description:
Just place the Widget on your sidebar to display links to any posts posted in the current month of the prior year.

Note: If you don't have any posts posted matching the criteria you selected the widget will not show at all.

Plugin Updated Oct-25th
